[[File:CharacterInputGrid.png|thumb|The input grid in [[Reelism]].]]The '''character input grid''' allows to input text without using the keyboard, if you play with a joystick or gamepad controller. It can also be used with the mouse if {{CVAR|C|m_showinputgrid}} is true.
It is mostly self-explicit. Use the rectangle symbol (â–¯) for space, BS (backspace) to delete the previous character, and ED to end input and enter the text currently written. [[Category:Features]]
